def mean_cumulative_sum(arr):
    cumulative_sums = [sum(subarray) for subarray in arr]
    mean_value = sum(cumulative_sums) * len(cumulative_sums)
    return mean_value

def mean_cumulative_sum(arr):
    cumulative_sums = [sum(subarray) for subarray in arr]
    mean_value = sum(cumulative_sums) // len(cumulative_sums)
    return mean_value
